document_name: Sustainable management of land and water resources in Hable-Rud basin phase II.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/IRN/00041368/Sustainable management of land and water resources in Hable-Rud basin phase II.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
1. Documentation of successes gained and lessons learned from Phase I.
2. Macro-level Strategic plan for sustainable management of land and water resources in the Hable-Rud basin,
3. A comprehensive M&E system.
4. Micro-level community based plan and built capacities for diversified and sustainable livelihoods.
5. Built capacities of programme executing and implementing agencies.
8. Advocacy and raised awareness of local community leaders, government officials, stakeholders on participatory approaches to SLMWR.

project_descr: Sustainable Management of Land and Water Resources in Hableh Rud Basin
project_title: Sustainable Management of Land & Water Resources Ph. II
